analysis.description:
PrivatePlacement.createTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#316-335) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#327-328)
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol)

Reentrancy in PrivatePlacement.createTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#316-335):
	External calls:
	- token.totalSupply() + tokens > hardcap (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#321-335)
	- tokens = hardcap - token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#324)
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#327-328)
	- isSent = msg.sender.call.gas(3000000).value(change)() (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#332-335)
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- isSent = msg.sender.call.gas(3000000).value(change)() (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#332-335)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb57a7a1b210835b4b1a05b74c3c25f27b4b385.sol#1): it allows old versions
